safety_mechanisms.TEQ: Task-specific Enforcement Queue with require_* checks
safety_mechanisms.Consent: Signed ledger with freshness & field scopes
safety_mechanisms.Provenance: Signed Merkle receipts (W3C PROV-ish), Kafka/S3 sinks

limitations: Relies on policy pack coverage; gaps reduce enforcement efficacy.
In-process sandboxing is not a kernel boundary; combine with OS sandboxing for untrusted binaries.
intended_use: Enterprise assistive workflows with auditable provenance.
Research and analytics with privacy-preserving receipts.
prohibited_use: High-stakes medical/financial advice without a qualified human in the loop.
Surveillance or privacy-invasive profiling without explicit consent and legal basis.
